title: Beneath the Canopy, For All Time
summary: For over a millennium, five ethnic groups—Bulang, Dai, Hani, Wa, and Lahu—have shared ancient tea forests on Jingmai Mountain. The "two leaves, one bud" totem embroidered on Bulang clothing represents more than tea; it embodies gratitude and reverence for nature. Here, ethnic boundaries fade away into a shared reverence for tea ancestors and ancient groves.
